title: Intentions for the Week
description: Intentions for the Week- Week 8 in 2025 Hi hiiiiii! Welcome to week 8! Cooper has the next two days off of school so I postponed meal prep this week. Might do it today or tomorrow. We’ll see! I did spend time working on adding more plants to my collection. I am enjoying my experiments. Anywho… Here are my Intentions for the Week! Intentions this Week This week’s intentions: Mind/Body follow up with doc morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out my Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in my food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch move body daily breath work work in Currently workbook check-in with calendar art time floss daily horoscope journal night on The Hope Circuit connect with my spirit work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitamins stay hydrated read before bed quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the week i love lists record stuff my everyday life tracy’s tracking tools post hobo daily pages feb pages edit video post recipe organize tax stuff hope circuit check in figure out next binder class SELF Check In! upload/edit photos recipe testing work on Currently Workbook work on THC clean up office package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning on my Pinterest account Tailwind catch up on social media clean up workspace bookkeeping/pay bills emails go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop organize my office paper piles laundry put down mulch plant things litterboxes water indoor plants go through pantry compost/worm bin clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs clean out car straighten up garage refill pill case garbage/recycling Last Week’s Intentions: Mind/Body doctor’s appointment morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out my Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in my food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch move body daily breath work work in Currently workbook check-in with calendar art time floss daily horoscope open forum on The Hope Circuit connect with my spirit work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitamins stay hydrated read before bed quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the week i love lists record stuff my everyday life tracy’s tracking tools post hobo daily pages post recipe organize tax stuff hope circuit check in figure out next binder class SELF Check In! upload/edit photos recipe testing work on Currently Workbook work on THC clean up office package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning on my Pinterest account Tailwind catch up on social media clean up workspace bookkeeping/pay bills emails go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop organize my office paper piles laundry put down mulch plant things litterboxes water indoor plants go through pantry compost/worm bin clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs clean out car straighten up garage refill pill case garbage/recycling Posts to Inspire: Thai Broccoli Salad Potato Chorizo Egg Bites Flat Roasted Chicken Baked Tofu Buddha Bowls Milk & Cookies Smoothie Peanut Butter Oat Muffins If you make a recipe from Shutterbean, tag me on Instagram! I’d love to see your creations! Here’s a mood: Mantra for the week! Feeling stuck? Make a list! Write down your intentions for the week to help hold you accountable for action. My Intentions for the Week Calendar can help!! You can start it at any time of the year! I also have a printable if you work well with a one-sheet. Here it is in a binder. It’s part of my Time Management Printable pack! Need extra help? Join my accountability group: SELF-CHECK-IN We spend Sunday mornings 9:00 AM PST-10:30 AM- PST working on our calendars and checking in together. Those are my Intentions for the Week! Wishing you a productive week. Take good care of YOU! The post Intentions for the Week appeared first on Shutterbean.
excerpt: Intentions for the Week is a weekly TO DO list/planner started by Tracy Benjamin of Shutterbean.com & The Handwriting Club!
text: Intentions for the Week- Week 8 in 2025 Hi hiiiiii! Welcome to week 8! Cooper has the next two days off of school so I postponed meal prep this week. Might do it today or tomorrow. We’ll see!  I did spend time working on adding more plants to my collection. I am enjoying my experiments.  Anywho… Here are my Intentions for the Week!  Intentions this Week  This week’s intentions:  Mind/Body follow up with doc morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out my Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in my food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch move body daily breath work work in Currently workbook check-in with calendar  art time floss daily horoscope journal night on The Hope Circuit connect with my spirit  work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitamins  stay hydrated  read before bed quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the week  i love lists  record stuff my everyday life tracy’s tracking tools  post hobo daily pages  feb pages  edit video post recipe organize tax stuff hope circuit check in figure out next binder class SELF Check In!  upload/edit photos recipe testing work on Currently Workbook  work on THC clean up office package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning on my Pinterest account Tailwind catch up on social media clean up workspace  bookkeeping/pay bills emails  go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop organize my office paper piles  laundry  put down mulch plant things litterboxes water indoor plants  go through pantry  compost/worm bin clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs clean out car straighten up garage  refill pill case garbage/recycling Last Week’s Intentions:  Mind/Body doctor’s appointment morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out my Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in my food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch move body daily breath work work in Currently workbook check-in with calendar  art time floss daily horoscope open forum on The Hope Circuit connect with my spirit  work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitamins  stay hydrated  read before bed quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the week  i love lists  record stuff my everyday life tracy’s tracking tools  post hobo daily pages  post recipe organize tax stuff hope circuit check in figure out next binder class SELF Check In!  upload/edit photos recipe testing work on Currently Workbook  work on THC clean up office package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning on my Pinterest account Tailwind catch up on social media clean up workspace  bookkeeping/pay bills emails  go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop organize my office paper piles  laundry  put down mulch plant things litterboxes water indoor plants  go through pantry  compost/worm bin clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs clean out car straighten up garage  refill pill case garbage/recycling Posts to Inspire:  Thai Broccoli Salad Potato Chorizo Egg Bites Flat Roasted Chicken Baked Tofu Buddha Bowls Milk & Cookies Smoothie Peanut Butter Oat Muffins  If you make a recipe from Shutterbean, tag me on Instagram! I’d love to see your creations!  Here’s a mood:  Mantra for the week! Feeling stuck? Make a list! Write down your intentions for the week to help hold you accountable for action.  My Intentions for the Week Calendar can help!!   You can start it at any time of the year! I also have a printable if you work well with a one-sheet. Here it is in a binder.  It’s part of my Time Management Printable pack!  Need extra help? Join my accountability group: SELF-CHECK-IN We spend Sunday mornings 9:00 AM PST-10:30 AM- PST working on our calendars and checking in together.  Those are my Intentions for the Week!  Wishing you a productive week. Take good care of YOU!
html:
Intentions for the Week- Week 8 in 2025

Hi hiiiiii! Welcome to week 8! Cooper has the next two days off of school so I postponed meal prep this week. Might do it today or tomorrow. We’ll see!  I did spend time working on adding more plants to my collection. I am enjoying my experiments. 

Anywho…

Here are my Intentions for the Week! 

Intentions this Week 

This week’s intentions: 

Mind/Body

  • follow up with doc
  • morning pages/ morning routine
  • 30 minutes no screen after wakeup
  • fill out my Intentions for the week calendar
  • keep track of what I eat in my food journal
  • keep track of movement on Apple watch
  • move body daily
  • breath work
  • work in Currently workbook
  • check-in with calendar 
  • art time
  • floss daily
  • horoscope
  • journal night on The Hope Circuit
  • connect with my spirit 
  • work in my hobonichi cousin
  • outdoor time/hike?
  • pull cards/journal/video
  • watch how much time I spend on the phone
  • tweeze things
  • paint nails
  • clean house + phone a friend
  • use my diffuser
  • steam facial
  • take vitamins 
  • stay hydrated 
  • read before bed
  • quality time with my cats
  • get enough sleep

Work:

  • intentions for the week 
  • i love lists 
  • record stuff
  • my everyday life
  • tracy’s tracking tools 
  • post hobo daily pages 
  • feb pages 
  • edit video
  • post recipe
  • organize tax stuff
  • hope circuit check in
  • figure out next binder class
  • SELF Check In! 
  • upload/edit photos
  • recipe testing
  • work on Currently Workbook 
  • work on THC
  • clean up office
  • package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!)
  • catch up pinning on my Pinterest account
  • Tailwind
  • catch up on social media
  • clean up workspace 
  • bookkeeping/pay bills
  • emails 
  • go to P.O. Box

Home

  • grocery shop
  • organize my office
  • paper piles 
  • laundry 
  • put down mulch
  • plant things
  • litterboxes
  • water indoor plants 
  • go through pantry 
  • compost/worm bin
  • clean kitchen
  • clear off stairs
  • clear off dining room table
  • vac stairs
  • clean out car
  • straighten up garage 
  • refill pill case
  • garbage/recycling

Last Week’s Intentions: 

Mind/Body

  • doctor’s appointment
  • morning pages/ morning routine
  • 30 minutes no screen after wakeup
  • fill out my Intentions for the week calendar
  • keep track of what I eat in my food journal
  • keep track of movement on Apple watch
  • move body daily
  • breath work
  • work in Currently workbook
  • check-in with calendar 
  • art time
  • floss daily
  • horoscope
  • open forum on The Hope Circuit
  • connect with my spirit 
  • work in my hobonichi cousin
  • outdoor time/hike?
  • pull cards/journal/video
  • watch how much time I spend on the phone
  • tweeze things
  • paint nails
  • clean house + phone a friend
  • use my diffuser
  • steam facial
  • take vitamins 
  • stay hydrated 
  • read before bed
  • quality time with my cats
  • get enough sleep

Work:

  • intentions for the week 
  • i love lists 
  • record stuff
  • my everyday life
  • tracy’s tracking tools 
  • post hobo daily pages 
  • post recipe
  • organize tax stuff
  • hope circuit check in
  • figure out next binder class
  • SELF Check In! 
  • upload/edit photos
  • recipe testing
  • work on Currently Workbook 
  • work on THC
  • clean up office
  • package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!)
  • catch up pinning on my Pinterest account
  • Tailwind
  • catch up on social media
  • clean up workspace 
  • bookkeeping/pay bills
  • emails 
  • go to P.O. Box

Home

  • grocery shop
  • organize my office
  • paper piles 
  • laundry 
  • put down mulch
  • plant things
  • litterboxes
  • water indoor plants 
  • go through pantry 
  • compost/worm bin
  • clean kitchen
  • clear off stairs
  • clear off dining room table
  • vac stairs
  • clean out car
  • straighten up garage 
  • refill pill case
  • garbage/recycling

Posts to Inspire: 

Thai Broccoli Salad

Potato Chorizo Egg Bites

Flat Roasted Chicken

Baked Tofu

Buddha Bowls

Milk & Cookies Smoothie

Peanut Butter Oat Muffins 

If you make a recipe from Shutterbean, tag me on Instagram! I’d love to see your creations! 

Here’s a mood: 

Mantra for the week!

Feeling stuck? Make a list! Write down your intentions for the week to help hold you accountable for action. 

My Intentions for the Week Calendar can help!!   You can start it at any time of the year!

I also have a printable if you work well with a one-sheet. Here it is in a binder. 

It’s part of my Time Management Printable pack! 

Need extra help? Join my accountability group:

SELF-CHECK-IN

We spend Sunday mornings 9:00 AM PST-10:30 AM- PST working on our calendars and checking in together. 

Those are my Intentions for the Week! 

Wishing you a productive week. Take good care of YOU!
